DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety of a novel contact lens in healthy normal volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of a Contact Lens With Ketotifen in Healthy, Normal Volunteers
DOC.criteria: healthy normal, soft contact lens wearing volunteers normal ocular health contact lens correction from +6.00 to 12.00D in each eye and astigmatism of 1.00D or less in each eye active ocular infection history of ocular surgery use of topical ophthalmic preparations (including rewetting drops) pregnancy or lactation
